src:
Tiket Pesawat Mahal Buat Liburan, Bagaimana Wishnutama?
05 Nov 2019, 23:30 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama dan Angela Tanoe (dok Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Salah satu tantangan Menparekraf Wishnutama adalah soal tiket pesawat yang mahal buat liburan. Bagaimana solusinya?Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif, Wishnutama dan wakilnya Angela menghadiri acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019). Mereka pun memaparkan banyak hal, dari bagaimana pengembangan pariwisata, devisa, dan lainnya.BACA JUGA: Berapa Target Kunjungan Turis ke Indonesia, Wishnutama?Wishnutama pun ditanya soal masalah tiket pesawat yang mahal buat liburan. Apa katanya?"Itu saya diprotes, banyak yang complain ke saya," ujarnya.Wishnutama menegaskan, dirinya sudah bicara ke Menteri BUMN dan Menteri Perhubungan. Masalah tiket pesawat harus segera diatasi agar pergerakan wisatawan dalam negeri dan mancanegara di Indonesia menggeliat lagi."Ini akan dikoordinasikan, bagaimana tiket ini menjadi murah dan lebih terjangkau, serta akan meningkatkan jumlah wisatawan," tuturnya.BACA JUGA: Wishnutama-Angela Segera Keliling 5 Destinasi Super PrioritasWishnutama pun tak mau, orang-orang Indonesia liburan ke luar negeri karena tiket yang murah. Apalagi sejatinya, Indonesia punya banyak destinasi wisata yang indah."Orang Indonesia juga mau kali liburan ke Labuan Bajo. Jangan sampai orang bilang (liburan) ke luar negeri lebih murah dibanding ke negeri sendiri. Ini tantangan kita, bagaimana supaya tiket pesawat bisa lebih murah," tutupnya. Simak Video "Tak Hadiri Wisuda Putrinya karena Pelantikan, Wishnutama Minta Maaf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)
FOKUS BERITA

Duet Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe
text:
Expensive Flight Tickets For Holidays, How to Wishnutama?
05 Nov 2019, 23:30 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama and Angela Tanoe (dock of the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta Duet - One of the challenges of Menparekraf Wishnutama is the matter of expensive airplane tickets for holidays. What is the solution? Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, Wishnutama and his representative Angela attended the Coffee Drinking Mas Tama and Mbak Angela event held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). They also explained a lot of things, from how to develop tourism, foreign exchange, and so on. READ ALSO: What is the Target of Tourist Visit to Indonesia, Wishnutama? Wishnutama was also asked about the problem of expensive airplane tickets for holidays. "What did he say?" I protested, many people complained to me, "he said. Wishnutama emphasized that he had spoken to the Minister of BUMN and the Minister of Transportation. The problem of plane tickets must be addressed immediately so that the movement of domestic and foreign tourists in Indonesia stretch again. "This will be coordinated, how these tickets become cheaper and more affordable, and will increase the number of tourists," he said. The Super Priority Destination, Wishnutama, did not want to, Indonesians going abroad for cheap tickets. Moreover, in truth, Indonesia has many beautiful tourist destinations. "Indonesians also want to go on holiday to Labuan Bajo. Don't let people say (vacation) going abroad is cheaper than going to their own country. This is our challenge, how to make plane tickets cheaper , "the lid. Check out the video "Not Attending Her Daughter's Graduation for Inauguration, Wishnutama Apologize" [Gambas: Video 20second] (aff / aff)
